name: e-commerce-fullstack
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with React frontend and Django backend

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver
scripts.dev:backend-only: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd e-commerce && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py test
scripts.clean: cd e-commerce && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf venv
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.migrate: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py migrate
scripts.makemigrations: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.collectstatic: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py collectstatic
scripts.shell: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py shell
scripts.createsuperuser: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.check: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py check --deploy
